summary: The diff updates Rose Day theme text color tokens in `frontend/src/index.css` and applies the stronger pink text styling to key header elements in `frontend/src/pages/RoseDayPage.tsx`. Based on the available (truncated) evidence, this aligns with REQ-12 and appears to address REQ-13 as well, though some sections (message card/footer) are not fully visible in the truncated snippet.
